params.deploymentData: The initialisation code of the contract to be created.
params.value: The value in wei to be sent with the contract creation.

returns.newContract: The address of the newly created contract.

params.deploymentData: The initialisation code of the contract to be created.
params.salt: The salt value to use for the contract creation.
params.value: The value in wei to be sent with the contract creation.

returns.newContract: The address of the newly created contract.

performCreate(uint256,bytes).notice: Deploys a new contract using the create opcode.

performCreate2(uint256,bytes,bytes32).notice: Deploys a new contract using the create2 opcode.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when a new contract is created
